name: Sweet Thief Shooter
description:
Darling is out to steal all the sweets in Hypercose.

Help her conquer this sweet fill land to claim it all for her self >:3c

This initial jam release has 1 short level and 3 million missing features, please enjoy ^^

Move: WASD or Arrow Keys or Left Stick

Attack: Space or Enter or A/X

Hold shift or shoulder buttons to slow movement speed

Escape is pause

Press Escape to Start
